title: Kim K's Bridal Look: Makeup Artist Troy Jensen's Top 5 Predictions
text: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's wedding is fast approaching and while there has been much speculation on the location, guest list, and gown—we're also buzzing about the little details, like, for example, Kim's bridal beauty. So, in order to narrow down the possibilities (because let's be honest there are a lot!) we turned to makeup artist Troy Jensen. He previously worked with the E! star for years and was happy to predicted five looks that we might see on the Big Day. Here's what he shared: PHOTOS: Kim K's wedding dress: 5 designer who could be create it 1. Classic Movie Star: "I love old Hollywood glam on Kim. She embodies the star quality of Marilyn Monroe and Elizabeth Taylor," says Troy. "Defined brows, Long lush lashes, a glowing complexion and a vibrant red lip. This is a great look for an elegant black tie evening wedding." PHOTOS: Best Kim & Kanye quotes 2.Hot Chocolate: "I love the mix of warm and cool tones. It shows a marriage of two beautiful shades: chocolate and silver. Plus, it's perfectly paired with a shimmery beige lip." PHOTOS: Kimye take France 3. Fringe Benefits: "Fresh, glowing and lots of long gorgeous lashes. I love when the only thing that stands out on Kim are her naturally long eye lashes. They make such a signature statement." PHOTOS: Kim & Kanye's best love quotes 4. Dark Glamour: "Going a little edgy could be very chic and modern. Black lined eyes and a pale rose pink lip are elegant and cool with Kim's tan skin." PHOTOS: Kim's mommy style 5. Completely Luminous:  "This look is created with shades of champagne, white peal and nude. The colors are soft and look stunning against Kim's warm complexion."
